section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:MockTemperatureSensorPID
A class to implement a PID controller Screen
A class to manage the OLED screen using Adafruit_SSD1306 library Temperature
A class to handle temperature readings from a K type thermocouple and an NTC thermistor TemperatureData
A data structure that holds the temperature data WebServerManager
Class for managing the web server
